synopsis.text:
Sydney, the city of dreams that Haruka Nanase once visited, now becomes his new stage. As he prepares to depart for the Swimming World Cup, he encounters a fellow athlete from the All-Japan Invitational, sparking a new wave of determination within him. Carrying the emotions and memories of those he's swam with, Haruka steps into a world filled with world-class athletes, including the undeniable champion, Albert Volandel.

As representatives of Japan, Haruka, Rin, and Ikuya are set to face their toughest challenge yet. The Swimming World Cup in Sydney awaits them, a tournament that will test their skills against the best in the world. As they strive to boost their morale, each competitor grapples with their own feelings and motivations. What drives them to compete at the highest level? Their passionate struggle against the water and their own limits begins here, marking the thrilling climax of the "Free!" series from Kyoto Animation.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
